body:
Comment 2 by **ahferroin7**: 
Memory split is 224M for CPU, 32M for GPU, and 256M swap.
hg identify returns "5e806355a9e1 (release-branch.go1) go1.0.2/release"
I've checked and the build does complete successfully, but all of the tests in
$GOROOT/test fail, in addition to the runtime and math/rand tests done in src/all.bash.
I am re-running the tests under $GOROOT/test after having finished a fresh build.
